body:
CC: @fryeguy52 

Tag: snl-atdm-issue

For some reason when we upgraded to spack 0.13.0, we are now getting warnings like:

```
==> Warning: Tried to remove /home/rabartl/Spack.base4/.spack-env/view/share/info/dir which does not exist
```

What does this come from and how do we make them go away?
title: Warning: Tried to remove .../.spack-env/view/share/info/dir which does not exist?
